attributes.action: Remove the age limit of 65 for disabled people to claim for help with mobility.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The disabled person, at the moment, has to claim BEFORE the age of 65. After the age of 65 there is no help with mobility whatsoever. Many people are stranded in their homes with no help to go out and live a full life. Help is needed.
